Posts.EditableText: Something I just thought up, you can edit the standard and error messages in quest already. Add the standard 'wait' message so if you want a normal response throughout your game you don't have to type it out each time. It's only a little thing but makes things nicer.

Posts.EditableText: Good suggestion, I've added it to the list.
